&nbsp;

I have been developing quantitative investing strategies for my personal account. The strategies follows the elements of quantitative trading and are rigorously backtested with proven superior historical risk-adjusted return than the S&P500 benchmark. 

&nbsp;

## Enhanced dollar-cost averaging

Dollar-cost averaging (DCA) strategy enhanced by technical analysis, to some extent, timing the market, that can achieve higher investment return and lower average than the traditional DCA approach.

&nbsp;

## AI stock selection

Machine learning model based on hundreds of technical, fundamental and sentiment indicators to predict the probability of stocks beating the market in the next 1 month, and portfolio construction from the topic picks from the model. 


&nbsp;

## Regime switching

Strategy via identifying switches in the broader market regime using a combination of quantitative signals, and constructing ETF portfolio within each regime.
